thread.title: Gurley returns to Georgia sideline, joins injured Chubb
thread.title_full: Gurley returns to Georgia sideline, joins injured Chubb

author: wtopstaff
title: Gurley returns to Georgia sideline, joins injured Chubb
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Gurley returns to Georgia… Gurley returns to Georgia sideline, joins injured Chubb By CHARLES ODUM October 17, 2015 8:41 pm 
ATHENS, Ga. (AP) — Nick Chubb is back on the Georgia sideline, and his old buddy Todd Gurley is with him. 
Chubb suffered a season-ending left knee injury on the first play of last week’s loss to Tennessee. He was on crutches as he followed the Bulldogs out of the locker room for Saturday night’s game against Missouri. 
Gurley, a first-round NFL draft pick by St. Louis this year, attended the game with the Rams off. 
With his left leg in a brace, Chubb used his crutches to maneuver to a trainer’s table, where he sat and watched the first half. Gurley stood beside him and at times shared the seat on the trainer’s table. 
Chubb’s injury ended his streak of 13 straight games with more than 100 yards rushing. 
___
